text:
Hotel murah, nyaman, penghuninya mayoritas bule dan hanya berjarak sekitar 2  menit ke pantai jimbaran.
Fasilitas kamar lumayan komplit dimana terdapat kulkas kecil, ad TV kebel dan kamar mandinya ad air panas. Tetapi kamar yang kami tempati bathtube nya rusak (bocor) sehingga tidak dapat digunakan.
Staff hotel sangat ramah dan siap membantu.
Wifi cukup kencang tetapi haya dapat di akses di luar kamar.
title: Dekat Pantai Jimbaran

text:
Untuk ukuran budget hotel, villa puri royan tergolong nyaman. Lokasi dekat dengan pantai, tempat makan serta memiliki tempat parkir yang cukup luas.
2x menginap disana dan saya merasa cukup puas.
Hotel ini juga memiliki kolam renang yang cukup besar.
title: Budget Hotel

text:
Hanya menginap satu malam dan tidak akan menginap lagi.  Sampai di hotel dan terheran dengan ukuran kamarnya.. kamu berjalan ke daerah lobi yang ternyata adalah ruang tamu dari kamar hotel bergaya apartemenmu. Kami punya halaman belakang kecil yang menuju ke kamar mandi kami sendiri yang dilengkapi dengan bak berendam dan shower terbuka. Sangat heran dengan tempatnya mengingat harganya hanya 25 Dolar Australia/malam, berpikir ini adalah harga yang bagus. Kemudian serangga-serangga mengerikan mulai bergulir masuk. Pertama kami menemukan laba-laba besar.. baik, aku bisa lupakan itu. Lalu kami menemukan beberapa tokek… Aku juga bisa lupakan itu. Tapi saat kami berbaring di tempat tidur kami menemukan beberapa serangga kecil yang tidak lebih besar dari beberapa mm ukurannya… kami terus membunuh mereka tapi kami terus menemukan puluhan lagi. Akhirnya kami pergi ke meja resepsi setelah kami menangkap satu di dalam cangkir dan mereka datang mengganti sprei kami dan menyemprot semprotan serangga. Tidak lebih dari 20 menit kemudian kami menemukan lagi serangga yang mirip kutu merambat dari sprei. Mereka pasti tersangkut di ranjang atau apalah. Apapun alasannya, itu menjijikkan dan hotel seharusnya tidak menawarkan kamar seperti ini.

Ada sarapan sederhana, telur dan roti panggang atau panekuk dengan kopi

5 menit jalan kaki ke pantai ada beberapa restoran makanan laut dan pasar kecil untuk berbelanja

bagus dan dekat dengan bandara hanya sekitar Rp40,000 untuk taksi

wifi gratis di area lobi/sarapan
title: serangga serangga serangga

text: Jangan berharap terlalu banyak dari hotel ini. Hanya setimpal dengan tarif yang ditawarkan. Kamarnya luas dan bersih (kurang lebih), tapi toiletnya ada dalam kondisi buruk. Hal terbaik dari hotel ini adalah lokasinya, hanya beberapa meter dari pantai dan sangat dekat dengan semua restoran di pusat area pantai. Para staffnya terlihat ramah, tapi tidak terlalu rajin. Saya rasa mereka tak terlalu mahir berbahasa Inggris, dan kami sempat mengalami beberapa kali miskomunikasi. Merek tidak menerima kartu kredit, yang mungkin merupakan masalah bagi sebagian orang.
title: Hotel yang sangat standar dengan lokasi bagus

text: Looked like this place was gorgeous in its prime but not anymore. Worst is the musty, mildew smell in room dark dingy. Old dirty lounge chairs, stained sheets... really needs upgrading/ maintenance. Thank goodness only there one night -couldn’t stand the musty room smell. Nice people just don’t know how to clean well. Dirty plugs, etc... needs to be thoroughly cleaned with good cleaners and get every nook and cranny. I have stayed in much better for the price. Kinda felt unhygienic yuk. Tv had rabbit ears, no real tv reception. Bring aromatic oils or febreeze if you stay here. Can’t be good for the lungs all the mustiness.
title: Musty Has Been

text: Dirty old chairs around the pool. Broken bricks and tile everywhere. Shower is just a trickle. Area of the beach is dirty. Breakfast is excellent though and it is quiet. Pool is clean. Rusty handrails. Place needs a painting and lots of repairs.
title: Awful

text: I stayed for 3 nights in one of the bungalows. The place could do with some renovating but I have no complaints, as the price was excellent. The beach is about two minute's walk away. I was told that WiFi only worked in the foyer area but was delighted to find it worked in the bedroom. (My bungalow was at the opposite end of the lovely pool to reception.) Breakfast was basic but adequate and was included. For dinner I loved the Cap Cay, which was a great price. Hana at reception was particularly helpful. I had a relaxing massage in my room from the delightful Rosa. I was amazed at how roomy the bungalows are.
title: Good value!

text: Excellent location, a short walk from the beach where you can enjoy a spectacular sunset and delicious seafood. Pool and breakfast are the highlights, room was spacious with a balcony with a sunrise view. Very helpul staff, they found a scooter rental for us so we could explore the Batik Peninsula and took charge of our airport transfer.
title: Good deal in lovely Jimbaran

text: Never again!We stayed one night and escaped. Blood stains on sheets and towels. Disgustingly dirty bath with fat cockroach in the shower. What a waste of that nice building.Although being an easy going traveler, I couldn’t find anything good about that place.
title: Horrible-NOT recommended!

text: The staff and the environment were amazing. Clean and moderate. Breakfast was good. Location is not the best. Beach is bit dirty. Not crowdy. 2min walk to Jimbaran beach. 30min taxi to airport. 1 hr to Kuta or simenyak. 1hr 30min to ubud.
title: Amazing place, good for the money.

text: We've been here already a couple of times, thats a very good deal of quality and price. Advantages are good location near the beach and great breakfasts. We liked their nice, big and clean rooms and swimming pool. The staff is really nice, friendly and helpful. But interior needs a lil renovation. Still, We'll definitely come back here
title: The favorite hotel of my sister)

text: Some of the previous reviews regarding the place are true, the rooms could be better kept, the quality of the sheets and towels could be upgraded and the border of the swimming pool could be better scrubbed. But the service is what makes this place so special, all the staff is extremely friendly and helpful, Hana at the front desk is always there to accommodate your request. The ladies at the kitchen and housekeeping are extremely sweet and nice. The location is great, a block from the Jimbaran beach, and if you walk on the other direction, you are a few blocks from the local food market, atm banks and small grocery stores. The water in the swimming pool is always crystal clear and after a hot day at the beach, jumping into that makes you forget all about the pool borders.
title: Good deal for the money you pay

text: Visiting a friend I had the pancake breakfast there twice and it came with access to the buffet of tea, Bali coffee, fresh fruits and juice. The staff are very helpful and friendly. Definitely can recommend here for simple economical breakfast. Guests get it included in room.
title: Fabulous Breakfast

text: Ive stayed here a couple of times. It's a bit old but its clean, tidy and the staff are friendly. Villa rooms are huge with reasonable price. Pool is well kept. Breakfast is really nice but simple food.
title: Quiet clean and friendly

text:
My family loved our 3 day stay here. The 'room' we got was huge and equipped with a full kitchen, separate bedroom, backyard and porch by the pool. The staff was friendly and helpful. Hannah did a wonderful job providing us with info and a driver for a day exploring the island (request Doni if he is available, he speaks fluent English, is personable and very knowledgable about anything you ask him about Bali or Indonesia in general. A great guy and driver, we loved our day with him)
The hotel provides a delicious breakfast and is close to the beach, fish market and stores and restaurants. And for a very reasonable price!
title: Very spacious and comfortable room

text: Stayed here on our first night in Bali having had it recommended by the travel agent. The staff were friendly but the hotel is grim. Paint peeling from the walls, hardboard doors that don't fit the frames, basin hanging off the wall in the grimy bathroom. Unless you really are on a tight budget there are lots of better places nearby.
title: Squalid but friendly

text: The Jimbaran bay area is awesome and this is a great price! They are renovating all their rooms now. We were not in a renovated room unfortunately but what we had worked for us. It's clean and close to the beach :)
title: Great price and close to the beach!

text: We stayed here for a few days at the start of our 5 week long family holday to Bali.The room was pretty basic and the bathroom did have an unpleasant sewage smell, but overall we were very happy with the price, service, staff and location of this hotel. Our kids loved the staff who looked after them as they were their own. Breakfast was fine, nothing special but enough to keep you going. The beach down the round was huge and it felt like it was our own personal beach as it was always deserted. It had long streches of sand and fairly calm water compared to the rest of the island. In the evening all the local restaurants put tables and chairs on the beach and they would fill up with people from out of town just to experience the sunset and atmosphere.This was one of our highlights of Bali
title: Best beach in Bali

text:
Room like a palace for a cheap price (even with A/C). Clean, wifi on lobby, free breakfast (great pancakes, pineapple and banana), swimming pool and nice staff. 
Close to the beach and really quiet (not on the Main Street)
title: Nice

text:
Air con doesn't work very well,  green water in the swimming pool, very light breakfast and no comment for dirty bathroom...Just one good thing, the airport is very close!
For Our last night in Bali, it was sad.
title: Old hotel

text:
Location: very close to beach, one of the best beach at this coast. Waves not so high. Thanks to this about 1 km from hotel is fish market (the one on this side of island). 
Its allowed to buy fish on market and prepare it on hotel's kitchen by yourself
Interior: repairs needed
Rooms with AC and without AC
Breakfast: very poore
General impression: more or less. Some people are living here for years
title: Hotel for budget tourists

text:
Not expensive, clean, staff are kind and helpful. 
To the beach about one or two minutes walk.
In 20 minutes walking you can reach the fish market , buy fresh sea food for not big price, and can grill or prepare it in front of the market for 20000 IDR.
title: Good place

text: Excellent location just a few steps from the beach and the seafood warungs. 5 minutes walk from the village fruit market.The famous fish market is within 15 minutes walk along the beach. Besides Jimbaran Bay is one of the few places where you may have a good swim in the ocean ))) Very cheerful and helpful staff. All in all I am satisfied with a spacious and light second floor bungalow providing a kitchenette and two large balconies where you may rest listening to the sound of the waves. So I keep coming here again and again. The pool is nice as well, but I wish they start daily cleaning a bit earlier in the morning. Of course some rennovation would make the place much better. But we get just what we pay for )))
title: Quiet and peaceful place to stay

text: This is an average service hotel, located close to the fishing village. It is best value for backpackers, budget travellers. The sea is really close by. The neighborhood is simple yet there are good evening activities few km ahead.
title: Value

text: Friendly staff, ok food. Good clean pool. I wouldn't really recommend Jimbaran as a place to go but if you want to, this place is a nice place to stay. The food was reasonable and the location was good.
title: Ok place to stay

text: booked a room for NYEve and when i arrived,,the aggressive manager told me to wait till 1pm.still waiting at 4pm as the AC wasnt working and not fixed yet.Asked about another room and was told I would have to pay for upgrade,,which I refused to do.Then he told me all the upgraded rooms were full,,they werent,,so why ask me for extra payment
title: dont stay here

text:
~12-15min by taxi from/to the airport, so ideal for a stopover. Room #1 was large with 2 double beds and airco, altho the AC does not blow chilled air so my room was quite warm and stuffy for the night. Bathroom was large with threadbare towels and looks very tired but clean. Hotel provides 2 complimentary 600ml bottles of water which was a very nice gesture. Wifi only in the reception area. All in all not bad but only if you need to be close to the airport and can find a good rate (I paid ~€22 for 1 night incl bfast).

Be aware the official taxi company on Denpasar airport charges tourists 150k IND for a single journey in the Jimbaran area regardless of actual distance. Hard to find since it's not on the main road, so make sure to bring a printout of the hotel's address and phone nr in case your driver needs to ask for directions.
title: Just a stopover

text: Lovely staff, good facilities and good breakfast, makes for okay stopover before flying. Located right on the beach. The rooms are dated, wifi limited to reception / pool. Pool not that clean. Glad only staying one night! But cannot fault staff, lovely team. Drove us to the airport for 50k Rupiah :)
title: Good for a stopover

text: The dogs that live there are very noisy, howling and barking often. I found it disturbing and I'm surprised that dogs live at the hotel. The buildings were looking old, dirty and in need of renovation.
title: Noisy dogs on premise howling and barking

text: This place is horrible. I would not recommend for anyone to stay here. The rooms are creepy. The bathrooms creepier. Just an all round uncleanness to it. The rooms are non air conditioned and the toilet in the bedroom only flushed on occasions.
title: Horrible place

text:
No smile, no help, not clean,rooms are old and not clean the climatisation doesnt works.
we only spend 2night in there instead of 5 as the hotel driver let us on our own with a child and a broking leg man. We went to the hotel next to this one,a much better place,the opposite of this one.
title: to avoid

text:
We only stopped by there for one night after getting off the airplane.

The room was old and poorly managed, it smells old and looks old. The garden with the swimming pool is nice, but I didn't get to use it.

It's not far from the beach, but I think we can still get better places with the rate. 

Wifi only covers the lobby, so NO WIFI in the room!

Plus Jimbaran beach is so disappointing with garbage all over the beach. We ran away from the place the next morning!
title: Was ok, but would not come back

text: Avoid this hotel by all means! The room is creepy with old furniture, the bathroom is very dirty. My shower was broken and you can see the bathroom towel on the picture. After showing the picture to the receptionist, I still had to pay 200 000 RPS for the room, which is unacceptable! There are far more better places to go to. No wifi in the room. And breakfast is so so...
title: A sad hotel in a state of neglect

text:
at first glance we wondered if we had made the right choice, but we spent 3 fabulous nights here.
extremely comfy beds, great pool, big family room with cold air con.
super tasty breakfast, 100 mtrs from beach and restaurant.
we ate at café lia which was amazing and andys, which was also delicious and a lot cheaper!
cheap little gift shop around the corner and not a far walk up the beach to check out the seafood market.
for $45 a night inc breaky for 5 of us, you just cant go wrong!!
title: cheap and great family hotel

text: These bungalows are not worth the money. The only good thing is they have 2 rooms. The negatives, in need of serious maintenance. TV, old small box type with broken remote and local channels only and reception not good. Kitchen , other than gas cooker there is  nothing else, have to borrow pots pans, crockery, utensils and what ever else you need from the restaurant. The furniture in the lounge is most uncomfortable. The bedroom had 2 single beds, there are no double beds in all off the complex so the staff told us. The toilet which was broken and dirty and shower are in a large room which you have to go outside to get into, not so good at night. The breakfast is basic, same every day, noodle , or egg and toast , fruit, tea and coffee. They do not have bicycles to rent as advertised on some sites. The no pets rule is non existent as some long term guest have their own dogs.Dogs wander in and around the buildings, even in the kitchen. The staff were great and embarrassed  to talk about the issues as they hear it from many guests. We were booked in for 7 nights but checked out after 4 as we had had enough. This could be a nice place with a bit of work, would not recommend .
title: Bungalow over priced

text:
We were not happy at all about this place. It's not bad, it really ain't, but it simply isn't worth what you pay for in our opinion. If it were about half the price this place would be a fair deal, but for 40USD a night it just was too much. We got the same standard and at times much better for half the price or even less.
We booked the accomodation in advance and stated that we wanted a double bed (it is clearly indicated on several sites that this is available). After check-in we realizied that we got a room with twin beds. When we asked we've been told that there are only twin beds in this hotel, that no room has a double bed, but that we could cancel our booking if we wished to. That was a pretty strange and unwelcoming start, and we are still not sure if no double beds are available at all, or if they were too lazy to change rooms or simply didn't want us there (maybe they don't like couples in their mid-twenties, at least most other guests were 50+, but that's just a blind guess). The TV didn't work, Wifi was only available at the lobby (other than indicated online), there were no pans in the kitchenette which makes it rather useless, the bathroom was shabby and filthy, there were only four, rather uncomfortable sunbeds at the pool, and the toilet was only accessible from the balcony.
This are all minor issues which we wouldn't mind too much, but they add up, especially regarding the pricing.
We asked them a couple of times if they could fix the TV (Jimbaran is a pretty boring place at night), the only answer was "later". When there was finally someone who seemed to be in charge, the unfriendly answer was that we can check out if we don't like it and complain online. Well, we did indeed check out the next morning, and complaining online is exactly what this review is all about.
Maybe if you are in their target group, you might like this place, the bungalows were pretty big and except the bathroom clean. It's neatly located a few meters from the beach, but otherwise at a pretty abandoned place, we didn't see any shops or restaurants nearby (other than the seafood restaurants at the beach). But for us it was definitely the wrong place, we never felt as unwelcome as here in six months of travelling, which comes as a surprise regarding how warm and friendly most locals are in Bali.
title: Unfriendliest place in Indonesia

text:
Last night off the Holiday we spend close to the airport. This place is so so. A lot cheaper then the resorts but nothing special. The beds are ok, but the walls need paint there were holes in the curtains and the hose off the shower was to short. The pool looked dirty and dogs were walking in and out. 
Although it's quite we were expecting more when we booked it based on the photos.
title: badly maintained

text:
This place is cheap and close to the airport. The staff are helpful and will help organising onwards travel and scooter hire. Furthermore, it is right by the infamous sea food beach BBQs on Jimbaran beach. However, the rooms themselves are pretty grotty. We we're put in a room on the ground floor which was very damp, dark and smelly. We asked for a change of room and were given a room on the second floor. It was less smelly but the beds were so damp it was uncomfortable to sleep. Both rooms were shabby. 

It's worth noting that the hotel is made up of more than one building. The largest - which we were in - contained most of the rooms. However, there are a further three buildings, each with two larger rooms - which actually looked more like the villas in the photos advertised. They looked much nicer than the rooms we had in he shabby, budget block.
title: Friendly staff but grotty, damp rooms

text: Got here at 11pm after a very long day travelling. The area was frightening..dogs,rubbish on the narrow lane...plus a naked man talking to a another guy.(He later entered the hotel; now with shorts on; to say he lived there.!!!) The pool was more an ornamental pond. The room offered was large with one table and chair? Plus a cooker (1960 type) Curtains were ripped and plaster pealing off the wall. Bedroom was dirty and the matress thin (1 inch) Although exhausted we declined the offer and found paradise  a liitle way away in Keraton Hotel
title: Wouldnt stay here if you paid me

text: The guesthouse is conveniently located 1 stroll away from the beach. Also one stroll away from the well-known Jimbaran night sea food. It has a liitle swimming pool. Standard room not avialable any more. Deluxe room(bed rroom + living rom with non useful kitchenette) is 360 000Rps. It can be convenient for a few days stay as it is spacious. They charge additional 100 000Rps for extra bed. Overpriced.
title: Very spacious rooms and a minute away from beach but would need a refresh

text: Villa Puri Royan is cheap and pleasant. Its only 100m from the beach. It's looking a bit old at the moment. Rooms were clean and tidy. The beds comfortable. AC worked fine. The pool was clean and cool. Breakfast included was at it's usual quality. Great value.
title: Still good

text: The straff was really wonderful, the location was good, close to the beach and the room was big. Not great plumbing though. They really should upgrade it. The breakfast was good and so was the other food I tried there. Nice play to stay in Jimbaran. I would definitely go back.
title: Great stay

text:
Positive things :

•location is great.just 2 min walking distance from jimbaran beach.

•Hotel staffs are friendly.

•Rooms are bigger with a balcony.

•Air condition is working well

•Geyser are old type but can meet your purpose.

• I just love their banana pancake and bali coffee in breakfast. 

Negative things: 

•Though Its a budget hotel, so negative things are considerable.some parts of it need refurbishment.

• They need to do regular maintenance and cleaning of their toilet.
title: Budget friendly vintage bungalow!!

text: A great location for exploring Bali, very close to Jimbaran beach. We had a lovely time staying here. The staff were incredibly friendly and helpful, organising drivers for us to go out for a day at a good price. Rooms are large and there is a nice pool to cool off in. Breakfast was a hit, with made to order pancakes (and other options) included every day in the price of your room. Yes, parts of the hotel do need a fresh coat of paint etc, but for the price you pay this is a excellent place to stay.
title: Highly recommend

text: In a nice quiet spot. Villa is nice but needs a bit of work. Poor water pressure, shower is just a trickle.. No air con in living room only bedroom impossible to sit in the lounge area as always stinking hot. To does not work no arial. Pool is nice breakfast ok no variety though. Nice balcony friendly staff.
title: Needs improvement

text: Got woken up at least 3 times by barking and howling from dogs. All these dogs live at the hotel! Some guests keep several dogs in their rooms. Where do these dogs go doodoo? Why would the management of a hotel allow this?
title: Dogs, dogs, dogs! Like a kennel!

text:
booking thru internet provide. Check with inn Gf. Take taxi from airport to the hotel.
Locate at one of the locall beach...just 5minute walking distance from the hotel.
It a quite place and hormony...sustable for relaxx with a pool middle of it.

Cons... Locate and the end of road ally...so it a quite walk to main road..for provision and transpot. How ever hotell staff no problem hail cab for U
title: Quite... relax

text: Spent a week here on a 2week trip to Bali. Great if u want a very quiet relaxing place to spend ur days reading, swimming, walking, eating seafood. Make note - Jimbaran is a very quiet place when compared to kuta/legian/seminyak. I found myself every second day catching a taxi north cause it was doing my head in. 3-4days woulda been a better idea. The hotel is simple. Requested a standard room with 1 large bed as I was a solo traveler. Sent 4 emails prior to arrival to confirm this and no reply. Tryed 2 seperate email accounts from various computers and still no luck. Poor communication skills. The room was satisfactory for the price (Jimbaran is generally quite expensive cause there are a lot of resorts pushing up the price). The bathroom smelt a little musty and was in need of renovation, but again acceptable considering the price.
title: Good value basic accommodation

text: Very disappointed with this place! Paid more than a lot of other places where we've stayed but not even half as nice! Stayed in room 12 and the following was wrong - Bedroom - walls damp and paint peeling, bedding stained and electrics not safe. Bathroom - smells damp,shower can't be used because shower hose too short to fit in wall attachment, bath blocked, water leaks from under sink, electrics not safe, tiles cracked and towels stained. I asked for another room and told that manager would check the complaint but nothing done! Avoid if possible.
title: Only if desperate!

text: Good location. Friendly staff. Pool! They offered toast and eggs in the early morning so we could eat before catching our flight! Room was HUGE but very basic. Perfect for a night or 2. Make sure to walk out to the beach and head South(left) to where the resorts are, the beach is happening there and more people are swimming with less/no boats. Rent a surfboard or SUP down there too.  I did not surf in the bay but 100 local groms were. I surfed airport reefs and rented a board and got a boat ride for 175,000 rp. I was walking North on the road asking around and was pointed to a family warung that would rent. Its about 5 min north of the "surf club" which you'll see.  Nice local family helped me out and made it easy. Airport reefs are good on a bigger swell, otherwise too small.
title: Good budget option beach/food/surf

text: We stayed here to be close to the airport for a our early morning flight.  The hotel is old and cheap but we really only need a place to sleep.  Seemed pretty clean.  The location is dark and quiet.  Not sure I would stay here again.
title: Cheap and near Airport

text:
I would like to thank the management and staff of this lovely hotel for their hospitality. When you arrive to a new country it is important that the first people you meet are welcoming. Vila Puri people certainly were. But so are Bali people. The most friendly people I have ever met. They are very helpful, particularly with transport options.
We stayed in the room on second floor with the balcony and lovely view. Breakfast was just average, pancake, coffee, fruits but was included in the price of room.
If you are looking for a peaceful place (Kuta is crazy) where you can relax, read the book at the beach or by the pool in your hotel, Jimbaran is a good choice. If you don't want to spend a fortune in luxury 5 stars around you should try VPR.
title: Great value

text: When I consider the cost to stay here (and I mean accommodation and incidentals) it is fantastic value. For example we had soft drinks by the pool for a family of five for Rp 35,000 that's less than $3.50 AUD, that's all of us, not each! You have to go to a fridge to get them, open them, return then etc, but wow, you couldn't beat it for value. The value extends to the kitchen as well for breakfast, lunch and dinner. The complementary breakfast is basic but you can pay for more food if required.  With regards to rooms, you need to know this. When you leave the foyer the numbers run right to left around the pool. No 1 is the first bungalow on the right, no 2 on top, no 3 next bungalow, no 4 on top, so on for 5 and 6. Next comes the block of rooms. Ground floor air conditioned rooms run from no 7 to no 10. Then two floors above. We had bungalow no 4 and fan room no 17. For an extra $10 p.n. We changed the fan room to an air con room directly opposite the steps of the pool - well worth it compared to a fan room on the top floor. Incidentally the fan is a cheap floor stand type! Our bungalow was ok, but because it was on the top floor and faced west it got very hot in the afternoon and only a ceiling fan in the lounge area (air con in bedroom only), so I think the ground floor ones would be much better (ideally no 1 - but I did not check). If you expect the Ritz then you'll never be satisfied, but if you like a little rustic Bali accommodation, it will be fine. Not much to do in the area.
title: Value for money

text:
If you are looking for quite place for relaxing at the local or budget price this is you place.
The room is front of swimming pool and comfortable equipment.
The villa is near the jimbara beach.. but deserted from outsider makes it less being maintained by locals. .
Coz the beach dirty with litter. 
The Villa mybe far from top beach and city center but there are local taxi on service at the villa entry. 
It evan little far from main road where you can get daily shopping.
But still comfortable for the price tag.
You need to rentallll taxi and drivers to move along from this villa.
title: Relaxing

text: We stayed 4 nights at the start of our holiday and came back for the last 2 nights. We loved the place. Very friendly place. Great food. Very close to the middle seafood warungs on the beach which is not to be missed. Try the little Bintang bars amongst the trees further along past the seafood warungs on the beach. Take a visit to the fish market early in the morning.
title: Loved it....

text: The Villa Purin Royan is spartanic, but it might just be the best place to stay on a budget in Bali. The staff is wonderful, and the pool is lushious! Location wise, you can`t do better in Jimbaran! Remember to tip your staff at the end of the stay.
title: Best service ever.

text: Only spent 2 nights in this quirky well located hotel in Jimbaran Bay. Excellent location close to the Middle Seafood warungs and the beach. Staff were friendly and helpful,as were our fellow guests. The breakfast was fine and the pool was great.... excellent value for very little money.
title: Bali's very own Exotic Marigold Hotel

text:
It's the second time we've stay there and it might happen a third.
Best value for money! Good breakfast! Nice people! Great pool! If you want to rest well,eat good fish in jimbaran bay and meet the beachs around it's a good place to stay.
title: Best place to stay in jimbaran and nearby!

text:
I stayed with my mom here for two nights, on room number 7. Originally I got room number 13, but mom is a bit superstitious about the number and so the staff kindly change our room to number 7. It's supposedly an aircon room but since I booked standard room, they took away the aircon remote and gave us a fan.

The room was spacious, with two queen size beds, an old television that has seen better days, and bathroom with tub and hotwater. The cleanliness of some area in the bathroom (like yellow water mark on the wall) is something bearable, because I've seen worst, so it doesn't bother me much, and mom also doesn't fuss on it, so it's an OK! The floor is kind of icky though does not irk me that much..

All the staffs there were so kind and helpful, every question I asked about how to travel to this and that place, they always answered and even gave me some suggestions. They also helped me booked a motorbike and gave me some on-the-road advices.

Breakfast is so-so and not much, but I am not a morning person, so a so-so breakfast of toast or pancake or fried noodle is fine by me.

Plus minus notes: the wifi is lobby-only, the local mobile network isn't working much inside the room, the living room has many books to read, location is near jimbaran/kedonganan beach (3mins walk)

A great stay for mom and me since we went back home with a smile and good memories!
title: Great stay!

text:
Abit of an exploring to reach the villa. Jln Pantai Sari is a 1-way st. leading to the main road, which means that us coming from the main rd. could not turn into Jln Pantai Sari. Use the adjacent junctions and make a loop via the beach rd Kedonganan. 

Internet wifi slows down every now and then, and only accessible in the hotel lobby. Not in the rooms. 

Book the room facing east. The sunrise view is spectacular. Also the direct sunlight act as natural alarm clock :)
title: Homely at best

text:
Stayed here 3 nights, 1 in an a/c room, 2 in a fan room. Both were clean and pleasant. This is no 5 star resort, but for the price it is perfect. The location is good, the food is decent, the pool is clean, everything is clean. The one complaint I have is the beds had flat sheets instead of fitted sheets, so I ended up pulling the up in my sleep.

Would stay again if I find myself in Jimbaran.
title: Clean, friendly, great value

text:
This tiny hotel is located very close to Jimbaran Beach and all that great seafood restaurants. 

The rooms are big, have a nice balcony, but are little musty....the worse thing is the bathroom...too old and needs a urgent refresh.

On the other hand, the staff is very nice, helpful and polite. The breakfast is great! There isn't much choice, but is delicious. The pancakes, the fruits....and it is included in the room price.

There is free wi-fi in the lobby and the hotel has a nice little pool. 

From there you can walk north to visit the fish market, the food market and the small stores. 

Great for a short stay after a long flight!
title: Basic hotel but with good location

text:
This hotel grew on me. Initially I was unimpressed, but the service was really great and I had a number of problems that the hotel staff were fantastically super about (lost wallet = panic...need I say more?) They went above and beyond, for sure. We were on the top floor facing the courtyard -- nothing special about the room, though it was fairly spacious. The walls are not very sound proof, but our neighbors were perfectly fine. There seemed to be some long term folks staying here as well: everyone was very friendly. I liked the little restaurant at the entrance and the breakfast system worked for me. Good wifi in the lobby, too. I almost gave this place a 3/5, but remembered how nice the staff had been. This is definitely worth something, and the location does make the hotel a very solid choice, not terribly expensive, though not exactly backpacker.

The proximity to the airport, beach and awesome Jimbaran Bay Beach (and seafood and spectacular sunsets) really makes this place good value. As another reviewer has said, if Kuta et. al. is not your thing, this is a viable option that won't completely break the bank. The village also grew on me and the Balinese hospitality shone through on everything: from asking simple directions, to getting help with an ATM, even getting an ice cream. We were in town for the triathlon last summer and the whole town seemed to know all about it, so that was kind of fun. 

Beauty all over and in the least expected places. I liked Jimbaran and this small hotel was a good base.
title: Great Location

text:
We (2 persons) only stayed for one night in this hotel on our Jimbaran leg of our two weeks trip to Bali in low season April 2012 before our flight back home and do not regret. Much more suitable departure point for us than Kuta (which we visited on a day trip from Sanur) and quite a lot total opposite based on our short stays. The price is cheap even by Bali standards and the location beach/seafood restaurant wise is superb.

Our room was on the ground level and it was really large and pretty clean although a bit worn out as the whole hotel seems to be. The room had a fridge and an AC which is always nice on these latitudes. The TV was showing finals of Indonesian Idols. There is also a pool available which looked quite nice but we didn’t get to spend any time in it. Our room had a strange kind of an decorative thingy behind the back window. This being a terribly dirty fish puddle where fish were trying to grasp oxygen from the surface. We hope our’s was the only one of such things in the whole hotel. They should really get rid of the poor fish. 
	
BTW: You could only pay the room by cash and the two ATM's are located a bit far from the hotel to the north along the main road, the closer one not accepting my VISA.
title: Close to the beach and seafood... just outside your window

text:
We arrived late after a long day of travelling. We had a car pick us up and take us to the hotel. Our room was spacious and clean, not flash but you can't complain for US$16 a night. We stayed for five nights because we found it good value. We enjoyed being away from the bustle of Kuta. Ate some great food in Jimbaran on the water and in the main street in non-western restaurants.
The staff were great and we loved talking to them. We enjoyed relaxing in the pool, banana pancakes for breakfast and appreciated free wifi. We would stay here again if we ever go back to Bali. We stayed in Feb 2010.
title: Great value, friendly staff

text: Stayed here 2 nights on a stopover, basic but great value for money and very close to the beach and the central fish restaurants on Jimbaran bay.
title: Great location, Confortable, Cheap, Friendly

text:
Spacious rooms - a/c - towels changed daily - TV including a few film channels - free WiFi in reception area - small swimming with some sunbeds - seating area with table and chairs outside your room facing pool - 2 minutes walk  to the beach and excellent seafood warungs - friendly cheerful/helpful staff (and helpful long stay residents)- breakfast included - 10 minutes from the airport - very reasonable rates. 
The surrounding area is exactly what you would expect of an authentic Asian fishing village. In the moring elegant 'offering' ladies walk around the small steets and lanes placing small baskets containing food, flowers and incense in front of all buildings, these are offerings for the Gods, this happens twice a day - I didn't see any naked men though. 
If you want a cheap, cheerful, no frills, small hotel that's near the airport then this is for you. If you are expecting a European 3 star standard then it's not. Yes the rooms are pretty dated and could be doing with being renovated, but it is comforable that just adds to the charm.
title: Cheap & Cheerful Budget Stop Off After a Long Flight

text: Отель очень грязный, в номере вся мебель и техника в ужасном состоянии, куда только смотрит хозяин отеля, я не понимаю( единственный плюс отеля, что близко к океану и на этом всё. Чтоб видели какой вентилятор стоит в комнате, а так же сантехника в каком идеальном состоянии))) это очень смешно)))
title: Ужасно грязный и старый отель !

text:
Расположение хорошее, 5 минут до пляжа. Номера большие, очень большие, есть веранда, WI-FI. Большая ванная. Но все очень старое и грязное. Есть вентилятор и кондиционер, холодильник, газовая плита, электрический чайник, чашки, посуды нет. Территория зеленая, небольшая, есть бассейн. Завтраки по меню, чай, кофе. Воду не дают.
Не понравилось · Грязная кухня, ванная, розетки вываливаются. Если привести в порядок гостиницу, почистить, помыть,заменить на новое, то будет все нормально.
title: Шикарные закаты и морепродукты

text: Ich habe 3 Tage in der  Villa Puri Royan gewohnt weil ich erst am Abend in Bali gelandet bin. Die Nähe zum Flughafen, die 150 Meter zum Jimbaran Beach mit den vielen Restaurants und der Innenhof mit Pool haben mich zur Buchung in der  Villa Puri Royan bewogen. Ich war aber begeistert von den freundlichen, professionellen Mitarbeitern, der Sauberkeit (täglicher Zimmerservice) in der Anlage und dem Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis. Ich komme wieder!
title: Beste Leistung zum Preis

text: Nous avions opté pour les "bungalows"et la différence de prix ,minime ,est largement compensée par la qualité de l'appartement avec chambre plus une grande salle , terrasse ,frigo et salle de bains  immense. Hanna la gérante est extrêmement gentille et serviable.
title: Super.

text:
Estuvimos una noche en Jimbaran, lugar cerca del aeropuerto conocido por la cantidad de restaurantes que sirven marisco fresco a orillas de la playa. 
Buscábamos un hotel económico y cerca de la zona. Este hotel tiene una ubicación perfecta, muy buen precio y ofrece un desayuno muy completo. El trato del personal es muy agradable. 
Hay que comentar que las instalaciones están desfasadas por el paso de los años, pero justo estaban arreglando la zona de la piscina y tienen intención de ir adecuando todo el hotel para que esté más actualizado.
Esperamos poder volver en unos años y se encuentre renovado.
title: Excelente ubicación y precio

text:
Nous sommes arrivées tard depuis l'aéroport , un monsieur nous a monté la grosse valise. Personnel super gentil et souriant +++ pour Hana et son aide pour tout ce que nous lui avons demandé ( massage , conseil prix , location scooter..).
Chambre spacieuse avec balcon mais champignons sur les murs.
title: 2 nuits et nous reviendrons

text:
お部屋は広く安くプールも楽しめます。歩いてすぐジンバランビーチですし大満足です。
頼めば空港までの送迎もしてくれます。途中お願いすれば、携帯SIMの購入や両替も助けてくれます。
title: 安くても満足

text:
Wij vonden het een superverblijf, wat wil je nog meer voor die prijs, geen luxe lamers, maar heel ruim, ouderwets, geen telefoon enz., geen luxe, maar 100 meter van het prachtige strand waar je voor 50.000 tot 100.000 rupia’s de hele dag 2 strandstoelen hebt met parasol. Heerlijk Zwembad, prachtig tuintje. Heerlijke warme douches, ligbedden voor de deur. Heel vriendelijk personeel. Wij hadden een zgn. Bungalowtje voor 17 euro per nacht. Wel aan te bevelen om kamer of bungalow met airco te nemen. Ontbijtje simpel, maar prima en anders ontbijt je toch een keertje in de vele restaurantjes aan het strand? Rustig straatje. Strand is heerlijk en overal eethuisjes. Hoofdstraat is wel erg druk,maar daar merk je in het hotel niets van, omdat het in een rustig zijstraatje ligt.
Hannah de manager is een schat en zorgt voor goedkope taxi die ook nog op je blijft wachten als je een uurtje wilt winkelen of een bezienswaardigheid wilt zien.
Dus voor de minder luxe mensen onder ons: van harte aanbevolen!
title: Heerlijk verblijf

text:
Po te, co projdete uvitaci halu, otevre se pred Vami vyhled do vnitrobloku hotelu, ktery spise pripomina vyjev z pokracovani jurskeho parku. 
Vse pohlcuje divocina, coz je na prvni pohled sympaticke ale pri blizsim zkoumani, Vas zacne pohlcovat jisty pocit bezmocnosti. Personal je sice mily a prijemny ale resort, jehoz nejvetsi slava byla, tak zhruba pred deseti lety, to nezachrani. 
Pokoje jsou pekelne. Zadna klimatizace, v koupelne se vylozene stitite vlezt do vany bez bot. 
Hotel je idealni, pokud, zrovna priletate, nebo odletate z Bali a nemate moznost, jineho ubytovani. 
Na druhou stranu, personal hotelu je ochotny. Snidane maji super. A jako pozornost, dostanete jednorazovy kartacek s pastou.
title: Existuji lepsi mista....

text: La gérante de l'hôtel est très gentille et la piscine fort agréable. Les chambres sont rafraîchies régulièrement mais restent assez simples Elles sont cependant tout à fait correctes. L'hôtel est à moins de 100 mètres de la plage et il y des restaurants aux alentours.
title: Hôtel simple mais propre et peu cher.

text: Top pour le prix et la situation. Le personnel est souriant et même si l'appartement que nous avions méritait un rafraichissement, il était spacieux. Nous avions demandé à Anna de nous trouver une voiture avec chauffeur pour une journée excursion et le service a été parfait (mention spéciale à notre chauffeur qui nous a conduit aux différents endroits que nous voulions visiter et qui en bonus nous a fait découvrir un restaurant donnant sur une rizière ainsi qu'une visite dans une plantation de café ou se trouve des luwaks)
title: très bien pratique et économique

text: Notre dernier séjour à Bali avant de rentrer et on n’avait plus beaucoup d’argent, donc quand on a vu 9€ la chambre sur booking on n’a pas hésité, même si nos attentes étaient du coup basses. Et en fait : personnel adorable, on est venus nous chercher à Amed (donc plus de 3h de route) pour 500.000 rp (ce qui pour 2 personnes nous revenait au tarif du bus) chambre et sdb propres avec AC et eau chaude, piscine agréable même si l’hôtel vieillit un peu par endroit, ça reste très charmant. Le plus: leur restaurant est bon! Et absolument pas cher, surtout comparé à ceux des alentours ... les bananes frites sont les meilleures de Bali 😝 1 minute à pied de la plage de Jimbaran. Idéal!
title: Pour le prix, top

text: Très bon hôtel à proximité de la plage, des restaurants de seafood et pas très loin du marché aux poissons. Néanmoins un rafraichissement des chambres serait pas mal.Petit-dej OK. Hana est top, toujours dispo. Nous y reviendrons avec plaisir
title: Fin de séjour à Bali

text: Недорогие номера, около 20$ за ночь, делают скидку за длительное проживание, от 1 недели! Хорошее место с очень милыми хозяевами, убираются раз в день, в проживание включён завтрак(скромный - горячее блюдо на выбор: яичница из одного яйца или омлет, блинчик, острая(!) лапша, чай, кофе, вода). Номера все только с двумя односпальными кроватями, что для нас стало причиной поменять место жительства на острове, так же кровати очень мягкие, нам это не подошло! В целом всё чисто, в душе есть горячая вода, что редкость для Бали, душ конечно с непривычки шокирует, так как это просто лейка на стене и слив в полу, рядом унитаз, но такая ситуация в большинстве бюджетных гостиниц и гестов, к этому быстро привыкаешь! Есть балкон с видом на более пафосный  и дорогой отель (100$ за ночь)есть своя терраса со стульями и столиком! Также есть небольшой бассейн с несколькими лежаками, можно поплавать, когда в океане большие волны. На ресепшн работает женщина по имени Hana, она вам поможет организовать всё! Она отзывчивая, хорошо говорит по английски и помогла нам с водителем на целый день, мы объездили много достопримечательностей с милейшим парнем Дони, который нам ещё и всё про остров рассказал. Также, с помощью Ханы мы съездили на Нуса-Пениду и Гили Мено, гораздо дешевле, чем предлагают нашему брату наши соотечественники!) Три лодки с трансфером обошлись нам в 900 000 с человека! В общем, будете обращаться к Хане, передавайте ей привет от Марины, певицы из России) Всем добра!
title: Милейшие люди, в прочем, как и все на острове

text: Удобное расположение, для исследования Букита. Отель в паре шагов от пляжа. Номера большие, чистые, удобные. Но в целом, далеко от тусовок, и основных достопримечательностей. Подойдет на три-четыре дня по прилету.
title: Хорошее расположение

text:
海外旅行初めて、英語もインドネシア語もおぼつかない状態で女性2名で8泊しました。レイトチェックインや、空港のピックアップは事前に英語でメールしておきました。深夜に着く便だったのでお迎えに来てもらえるのは、安心でした。スタッフは英語とインドネシア語です。でも、とても親切なので、拙い言語でもコミュニケーションを楽しむことができました。
客室はエアコンなしの一番安いタイプにしましたが、5月〜6月にかけては扇風機だけで快適でした。ルームクリーニングもきちんとモップまでやってくださり、私は清潔だと思いました。
朝食はメインメニューを１つと、トースト・季節のフルーツ・飲み物がフリーです。
部屋からの眺めがとてもよくて是非また利用したいです。
title: とてもいいViraです！！

photos.caption: 落ち着いた雰囲気の小さめのヴィラ（Vira）です。掃除も行き届いていました。

text: Prima om twee nachtjes te verblijven, dichtbij het strand met enorm veel lekkere eettentjes. Vanuit hier naar de uluwatu is ook makkelijk te regelen. Het ontbijt was prima, niet enorm veel keuze. De badkamer was niet zo fris, de bedden waren wel oké.
title: Prima locatie

text: Un accueil des plus sympathique et serviable, un emplacement de rêve à 2' à pied de la plage et à 5' des restaurants de poisson, un prix ultra compétitif, bien entendu, la contrepartie est que cet hôtel est un peu vieillot.... il supporterait un coup de jeune mais en fait, il ressemble tellement au quartier qu'il en est touchant. J'y étais il y a 4 ans et je fus heureux de le retrouver. Un bon compromis pour qui a un petit budget.
title: Excellent rapport qualité prix pour cet hôtel vieillot

text: Bien situé et plutôt calme, piscine correcte, cette hotel pourrait être très bien. Mais gros point noir : la propreté. Draps tâchés (s'il n'y avait que ça, ça pourrait passer...), oreillers qui sentent la transpi, salle de bain pas faites avant notre arrivée (cheveux ds la douche et le lavabo), rideaux de douche sale et hors d'usage. En plus, nous avions une chambre ac AC mais bloquée à 27°, donc inutile... Ça fait beaucoup, même pour un petit prix !
title: Propreté pas terrible

text:
Si comme moi vous cherchez un bon rapport qualité prix pour un emplacement proche de l'aéroport... Parfait ! 

Nous avons demandé un chambre climatisée et avons eu un bungalow au rez de chaussée. 

Grande pièce de vie, chambre spacieuse avec rangements et climatisation. 
A 200 mètres de la plage et des resto poissons pieds dans l'eau - parfaite situation ! 

Ana vous trouvera des bons plans avec réduction pour la suite de votre séjour. 

Étant habituée aux hotels de standing, j'avais un peu peur. Certains commentaires m'ont rassurés, d'autres effrayés. Mais très franchement, il n'y a pas de raison de s'inquiéter. La salle de bain dispose même d'eau chaude ;-) 

Piscine sympa et endroit calme. 

Pour une première escale, c'est parfait !
title: Super première escale ! Super emplacement

text:
Nous y avons passé 2 nuits en arrivant à Bali, et nous y sommes revenus 2 nuits à la fin de notre voyage car nous avons trouvé l'hôtel vraiment très agréable
Il est très calme et idéalement situé à 2 pas de la splendide Jimbaran beach
La piscine est belle et relaxante, le petit déjeuner est très bon (petit coup de cœur pour le pancake a l'ananas!)
Le wifi fonctionne bien mais uniquement à la réception 
Seuls points négatifs : les serviettes et les draps sont tachés, la salle de bain un peu vétuste

Mention spéciale à la réceptionniste Hana qui a été adorable pendant notre séjour, n'hésitez pas à voir avec elle pour un transport vers l'aéroport, les tarifs sont beaucoup plus intéressants que les compagnies!
title: Très agreable

text:
Les + 
- Très bien située : à quelques pas de la grande plage de Jimbaran, a 15 min à pied du marché aux poissons, à 10min de très bons restaurants de plage, à 15min à pied de la rue principale 
-Chambre avec air conditionné (bien le demander sinon vous aurez Avec ventilateur : les nuits sont chaudes!) 
-serviettes fournies
- l'adorable Hanna qui peut vous rendre bien des services 
- possibilité d'organiser transfert depuis ou vers l'aéroport 
- pancake à la banane le matin : un délice ! 

Les - 
- sanitaires vétustes et chasse d'eau quasi inexistante 
- wifi uniquement à l'accueil et à la piscine (pas dans la chambre)

En résumé je recommande car très bon rapport qualité
title: Très bien situé !!

text: Un très bon acceuil. Chambre spacieuse qui supporterait un petit raffrechissement.  Plusieurs standing. Attention nous avions choisi les petits prix. Très jolie et agréable  piscine, très appréciable même si l océan n est pas loin.
title: Super

text: La habitación por el precio no estaba mal. Era amplia y se veía limpia. Lo que el baño olia fatal. Está cerca de la playa y bien ubicado. Alquilan motocicletas a buen precio y el desayuno no está nada mal.
title: Pasable.

text: No aria condizionata no wifi e rumore terribile di martellate nel muro, per il prezzo che propone è assolutamente da evitare, l'unica cosa buona è che è vicino all areoporto ma il mare in questa zona è terribile
title: Evitare

text: 2 бутылочки воды на все время пребывания.Холодильник грязный.Кондиционер закреплен на куске фанеры,Петли занавесок болтаются.У телевизора сломана кнопка включения.Что бы его включить,нужно в дырку от кнопки сунуть палец и там внутри что то нажать.от ванной испытали шок!Ванная из пластика треснута пополам.Ну и запах соответственный.Занавеска для душа грязная Переселились в Бунгало.Есть кухня с газовой плитой,20 литровая бутыль на подставке.НО не расчитывайте что то приготовить газа нет.Посуды нет.
title: Отель очень запущеный и неухоженный

text: Le rapport qualité prix est tout a fait correct avec des chambres propres et bien insonorisées , ce qui est très rare par ici. Par contre,les salles de bain sont vétustes . Le cadre est agréable avec une assez jolie piscine. Le personnel et particulièrement Hannah , la manager , est extrêmement gentil et serviable . Et la plage est a 100 mètres.
title: hotel simple mais bien situé et propre

text: Comodo per la vicinanza all'aeroporto e ai warung sulla spiaggia di Jambaran. Camere da ristrutturare, carina la piscina. Colazione con scelta tra pancake frittata e frutta fresca the o caffe'. Organizzano il transfer per l'aeroporto (15 min). Personale cordiale e gentile.
title: No, purtroppo!

text:
En lisant les précédents avis négatifs, j,'avais un peu peur!
Mais ils ne sont pas justifiés!
C'est hôtel est d'un très bon rapport qualité prix et très proche de la grande plage!
Oui c'est un hôtel vieillissant qui a perdu de sa fraicheur, mais qu'importe, il a un charme désuet!
La piscine est très agréable.
La chambre avec clim est spacieuse.
La salle de bain vieillotte c'est sur ;)
A recommander!
title: Bonne situation, bon rapport qualité prix

text:
Неплохой завтрак. На выбор: панкейк (очень пышный, больше таких нигде на острове не делали), омлет, жареная лапша. Плюс напиток на выбор: чай, кофе или свежевыжатый апельсиновый сок. Плюс тарелочка с фруктами. Отличное расположение: до рыбного рынка минут 10 пешком, до улочки с ресторанами на пляже то же близко. В общем, отель в самом центре, до пляжа 5 минут не больше. Хороший бассейн, приятный дворик: красывый, чистенький. На бассейне полотенца.

Очень плохие номера! Этот отель был первым в нашем путешествии, и увидев номер, я захотела сразу из него уйти. Во-первых, при бронировании я указывала, что нам нужна двухспальная кровать. Дали номер с двумя односпальными и отказались поменять. Ладно кровати мы сдвинули. Во-вторых, очень грязно. Белье насыщенно желтого цвета (при том, что понятно, что изначально оно было белым), белье не меняют, а только расправляют его на кровати (простынь была с одним и тем же пятном).Ванна грязная. Из банных принадлежностей только 1 малюсенькая бутылочка жидкого мыла, которую то же не обновляли при уборке.
title: Хороший завтрак и бассейн, отличное расположение, но номера - ужас!

text: Hôtel bien situé, proche de la plage, personnel aimable. Mais un service de restauration très aléatoire, pas de repas du soir, et, le midi, c'est selon ! Service de blanchisserie très cher. Très cher aussi le transfert à l'aéroport par la voiture de l'hôtel. Pour un hôtel de ce standing, on attendrait mieux, par exemple un libre service d'eau potable, Aqua ou autre. Piscine, petite, pas toujours très propre. Suis resté 7 nuits de suite dans cet hôtel. J'ai eu du mal à obtenir une réduction (d'environ 12,2 %) du prix de la chambre alors que, étant seul, je n'ai utilisé qu'un lit "single", pris un seul petit-déjeuner chaque jour et ai pris plusieurs repas de midi à hôtel.
title: Hôtel agréable, bien situé, proche de la plage, personnel aimable.

text:
Très déçu à la descente de l'avion ...car après 21 h de vol :la piscine était vide !
En travaux depuis plusieurs semaines (d'ailleurs en 2 j de présence je n'ai vu personne y travailler)
Les chambres sont vétustes et limite propre.
Petit déjeuner succinct...
Seul point positif :sa proximité de la belle plage de Jimbaran 
Je ne recommande pas ...et n'y retournerai pas.
title: À éviter !

text: Posto scelto soltanto per la vicinanza dai famosi warung di pesce sulla spiaggia e dall'aeroporto. L'hotel necessita una ristrutturata da cima a fondo. La nostra camera aveva il bagno che puzzava, ma puzzava talmente tanto che si sentiva pure in camera, senza contare che la vasca era completamente gialla, il lavandino e lo specchio sembravano quello di un bagno di un treno. Lenzuola sporche , aria condizionata rumorosa e mal funzionante, camera piena di zanzare. Costa poco ma spendendo poco di più si può trovare qualcosa di decente!! Da evitare!!
title: Evitatelo

text: Las sábanas súper viejas y amarillentas. No tiene aire acondicionado. La piscina súper sucia. El baño muy cutre. El desayuno mal. Pero para una noche antes de coger el avión si no eres muy tiquismiquis sirve bien. Está muy cerca de la playa de Jimbarán que es bonita.
title: Muy regular

text: L'albergo è all'interno di una bellissima villa, con piscina irregolare. Le camere sono molto grandi, pulite e confortevoli. La colazione è inclusa è molto buona. Il personale è gentile (soprattutto Hanna). Molto vicino alla spiaggia e ai principali ristoranti. Se proprio occorre trovare una pecca è il Wi-Fi presente solo in zona reception e il segnale debole. Consigliatissimo
title: Posto molto bello

text:
Наш первый приезд. За 2 недели - до санкций и курса доллара -заплатили 7 тыс. рублей. Приехали -небольшой номер. Маленький пруд с тыльной стороны номера -с рыбками. И только наш) Это дополнительный бонус. Пляж в 3 минутах.Баунти-картинки нет. Но красоту Бали вы ощутите на день 3. Это такое нереальное спокойствие. Даже в Тайланде такого нет.
Отель -немного осыпалась плитка и др.мелочи. Но это мелочи) Мы прииходили домой поспать и помыться))) Убирались ежедневно. И такие они все милые. На  завтрак всегда толстые блины. и это стало традицией)))А главное -рядом- в 30 минутах ходьбы -морской рынок. Там все морепродукты. А ведь все морепродукты для Бали ловят в основном на джимбаранае. то есть тут-свежайшие. И прямо на рынке за 1 доллар -килограмм вашей еды сдеелвют вам на гриле еще и соус дадут. а в кафешки пляжные мы приходили со своими морепродуктакми. ТОлько заказывали соки фрукты овощи))) Там мудрые люди -мы же все равно делали рекламу, вкусно поглощая еду. ООООчень вкусно. Своего пляжа у Виллы нет. Но мы брадли лежаки на пляже у отеля кератон-он на берегу рядом с нами. Там, под раскидистыми деревьями, красота и релакс. И все равно загораешь)))В общем, расположение отеля крутое! И если вы не ищете люкс-рекомендую!!!! Там есть и большой семейный номер!!!
title: Ооооочень понравилось

text: La habitacion sucia. Sabanas y colcha sucio y sabanas rotas. Le pedimos un coche de alquiler para rl dia siguiente a la mañana. A la tarde le pedimos si lo podiamos coger ya y noss dice que lo han alquilado y hasta la rarde del dia siguiente no lo tenemos. Lo peor es que se reian de nosotros. El aire acondiconado no funcionaba y el baño se inundaba de agua de una tuberia exterior. La tele no funcionaba. Es vieja y tenia los botones oara dentro.Me queje y nos ofrecieron cambiar de habitacion. Me enseño dos. Las dos sucias, ropa de cama sucia y el aire tampoco funcionaba. Las baldosas de la piscina se mueven al pisarlas. En la zona solo estanblos restaurantes de la xona de la playa con precios bastante altos. La playa esta bien pero no hay nada que hacer. Al dia siguiente nos fuimos y nos bajaron 50000 rp por las molestias. Todo un detalle. Pero si no quereis llevaros un disgusto no reserveis!! Puede esyar viejo pero la falta de limpieza es imperdonable. Si lo cuidaran estaria muy bien.
title: Ni se os ocurra!!! Don't book here!

text:
Das Puri Royan ist eher in der unteren Preisklasse.
Wir waren 2 Wochen hier mit einigen Tagen unterbruch, da wir die Gilis besuchten.Die Zimmer sind Sauber und werden täglich gereinigt, natürlich muss mann bedenken das man in Asien ist und nicht immer alles perfekt ist wie zuhause.
Das Personal ist sehr Freundlich und Zuvorkommend.
Frühstück eher bescheiden, aber gut und genug!
Wir kommen wieder.
title: Preisleistung super

text:
Wir waren gute 2 Wochen im Puri Royan zu Gast.
Anfags hatten wir das Zimmer 14, lag im ersten Stock und war eigentlich tip top. Da wir auch schon in Asen gewesen sind, wissen wir, dass wir nich die gleichen Standarts wie in der Schweiz erwarten dürfen. Aus diesem Grund machen uns gewisse Mängel im Bad kein Kopfzerbrechen. Es wird täglich gereinigt und die Leute die im Hotel arbeiten sind sehr zuvorkommend .
Später haben wir uns für ein Upgrade entschlossen und ein Appartement gebucht.  Absolut toll. Riesengross, leise Klimaanlage und ein Badezimmer fast wie eine Turnhalle:-)
Das Frühstück ist zwar nicht wirklich abeechsungsreich, aber gut und genügend. 
Man hat gratis Wifi, das ist während der Frühstckszeit immer ein wenig überlastet, aber mit der balinesischen Ruhe kein Problem.
Die Lage ist sehr gut, ein paar Schritte ca. 300 Meter, und sch ist man am Strand. Bei genügeng kraulen begleitet dich sogar der Hotelhund Brownie hin und zurück.
Wir kommen wieder, versprochen.
title: 5 Sterne für Preis Leistung

text: parfait pour une première nuit sur l'île. Nous n'y avons passé qu'une nuit mais avons été agréablement surpris. A 5 minutes de la plage, parfais pour un souper aux chandelles qu'offre les nombreux stand resto sur le bord de l'océan. Le personel est gentil, la chambre est correct et la piscine aussi. Bon rapport qualité prix.
title: un bon départ

text:
Situé à 5 min à pied de la plage, idéal pour aller méditer le matin et voir les pêcheurs et leur bateau. Sans compter le coucher de soleil et les restaurants sur la plage.
Hotel agréable et personnel aux petits soins. Toujours disponible. Lieu calme et reposant.
title: Bon rapport qualité prix

text:
Très bon emplacement à 5 minutes de la plage, vous pourrez profiter du coucher de soleil.
Bon rapport qualité prix pour cette hôtel qui commence à vieillir un peu.
Pas de climatisation mais c'est normal pour le prix.
Pas de wifi dans les chambres, uniquement à la réception.
Hôtel pour une nuit avant ou après votre vol.
title: Bien pour le prix

text: On a pris cet hôtel a proximité de l'aéroport pour les deux premières nuits. Un taxi nous y a conduit en 15 minutes. L'hôtel à proximité 500 m de la plage mais en retrait de l'animation pour la tranquillité. A proximité des restaurants qui vous proposent de choisir votre poisson et de le déguster sur la plage une fois préparé. Un hôtel très coquet avec un service petit déjeuner et restaurant. Wifi. Parking. Piscine au coeur de l'hôtel. L'hôtel de taille moyenne est composé de plusieurs maisons autour de la piscine. Très bien situé. Pour se détendre et prendre le rythme balinais.
title: En descendant de l'avion...

text:
Les odeurs et l'hygiène de la salle de bain laissent vraiment à désirer.  
La literie est vieille et très molle. Les couvertures ne donnent pas confiance. Il y a des trous et des tâches sur les draps. Les taies d'oreillers sont sales. 
La climatisation est très bruyante. 
Beaucoup de carreaux de la piscine sont cassés. 
Ne vous fiez pas aux photos sur booking. Elles sont anciennes.
title: Pas entretenu à rénover désastreux !!!

text:
hotel de passage tres sympa;   dommage q'il n'y ait pas de vaisselle malgre notre demande kichenette!! manque egalement d une machine a cafe ou pour chauffer l eau pour un the ! personnel tres sympa
dommage aussi pour le lit de la 3eme personne adulte ; j avais demande un lit d adulte et a notre arrivee, oubli !!! j ai du prouver que j avais la demande ;;malheureusement, un simple matelas a ete joute (a terre). television ne fonctionne pas...
title: bon petit hotel

text:
Franchement on n'est pas très exigent, mais niveau propreté c'était très limite, la salle de bain super vieillotte comme si la crasse ne partait, après une douche dans cette salle de bain on ne se sent toujours pas propre... Tache sur les draps, tous sent le vieillot, la poussière !  Le personnel est gentil et serviable, mais l'hotel... Pas de wifi dans la chambre, sur la réservation il y avait écrit air conditionner finalement on a eu un ventilateur.. Le chien qui boit l'eau de la piscine, les transat qui date d'une bonne 20 aine d'année, j'ai du mal à imaginer quelqu'un profiter de la piscine... 

Bref, c'est vraiment pas cher, mais bon il n'y a pas grand chose à faire à Jimabaran non plus. Je déconseille.
title: A éviter

text: Место не уютное, грязное и обшарпанное, не смотря на то что убираются каждый день. Завтрак бп, толстый блин или тост. Бассейн грязный , маленький. Не стоит останавливаться даже на несколько ночей, поблизости много более достойных мест!!!
title: Плохо...

text: Отель для бюджетного туриста, чтобы искупаться, поужинать и встретить закат. Стандарт маленький и "уставший". Люкс имеет большую площадь которая неудобно организована, мебель и двери - все старое и пашарпанное. Однако для определенной цели - остановиться на пляже Джимбаран, недалеко от местечка Кафе Муайя - это отличный выбор.
title: Дешевый отель в отличном месте

text:
Si vous cherchez un hôtel pour vous poser 2/3 jours à votre arrivée avant de vous lancer ailleurs, le Villa Puri est idéal.
Pour un prix très abordable, ce qui devient de plus en plus rare sur Jimbaran, vous allez profiter d'un environnement calme ( rare dans ce coin de Bali), personnel serviable et d'un piscine pour se rafraichir du choc de température. 
Service de massage pour commencer à profiter des bonheurs balinais et à 200m de la plage aux restaurants sur le sable ou vous pourrez déguster vos premières langoustes ( ceci dit assez cher pour Bali).
Ceci dit l'environnement est assez sale et sans beaucoup d'intérêt.
C'est le seul hôtel que je réserve à l'avance afin de ne pas galérer à mon arrivée ( après plus de 20h d'avion) ....la suite du voyage, c'est au feeling.....et surtout loin de ce coin de Bali surexploité touristiquement.
title: Idéal pour l'arrivée sur Bali

text: Je descends dans cet hôtel près de l'aéroport pour passer une nuit en transit vers d'autres îles (lombok, sulawesi etc). Pas grand intérêt dans cette partie de l'île si ce n'est le temple au bout de la presqu'île. Et les restos du soir sur la plage. Un délice de dîner aux chandelles les pieds dans le sable après 12h d'avion. Le roman café où je vais est très bien, prix très correct et dîner copieux
title: hôtel discret agréable calme à 15mn de l'aéroport

text: Были на Бали в первый раз !!!от аэропорта ехали на такси очень удобно  ехать совсем близко !!!ночью было слышно шум волн  !!!!на утро предложили мото байк за хорошую цену !!! Удобно ехать во все места утр 15 минут на мопеде !!рядом рыбный рынок   !!!цена номера была 1200 рублей !!всем совкую кто первый раз приезжает на Бали можно даже заселиться на пару дней составить маршрут и ехать по острову дальше !!!
title: Бали

text: Nickel pour une premiere nuit à Bali car cet hotel est situé proche de l'aeroport. Acceuil chaleureux et proche de la plage et des restaurant de poisson frais. Bon rapport qualité prix. Je vous le conseille vraiment pour queqlues nuit qui permette d'atterie ou de décoller (:
title: MOYEN

text: Een fijne plek, heel dicht bij rustig en prachtig strand. Personeel is erg aardig en behulpzaam, lekker ontbijt. Ruime kamers, badkamer wat gedateerd. Lekker zwembad. Prima prijs - kwaliteit verhouding!!
title: Fijne plek!

text: Отель распологается вблизи выхода к пляжу, недалеко от ресторанчиков на берегу. Выход из номеров к бассейну, вода в бассейне приятной температуры. Завтраки на выбор - рис, лапша, тосты и чай/кофе/сок. Вайфай хороший, но только в общем холле
title: Отличный вариант для 1-2 ночей

text:
Nuit a 500 000 rp. Chambre propre et bien tenue. Cadre agreable et proximite plage.
 bemol trop cher pour le service  jai fait  des hotels 2 fois moins chers et mieux tenus.
Petit dejeuner tres tres leger et moyen ( peu souriant) 
Presence chiens et tiques en nombre autour de la piscine voir photo.....
title: Bof pour le prix

text:
Ich bin gestern in der Nacht angekommen und werde hier auch noch eine weitere Nacht verbringen.

Wir zahlen zu 2. Für 2 nãchte 44€ und aufgrund dessen bin ich schwer begeistert vom Hotel. Ich habe mich aufs schlimmste eingestellt und war mehr als positiv überrascht! Ich würde (meine freundin kommt erst morgen) sehe freindlich von Hannah begrüßt, die mich auch bis aufs Zimmer begleitet.

Für balianesische Verhältnisse finde ich es sehr sauber (und hallo, es kostet 11/ euro pro nacht..) das Bad ist etwas schmuddelig, aber bei weitem nicht ekelhaft oder so.

Das Frühstück geht von 7.30-10.30 undan bekommt pancakes, toast, eggs, spicy noodles, nescafe, tee, melone. Geschmeckt hats mir nicht sooo, aber es war ja auch meine erstes Frühstück auf einem anderen Kontinent

Das Meer ist sofort zu Fuß zu erreichen und mit dem Taxi war ich in 15 Minuten hier. Ich habe 100.000 rupiah bezahlt. Es war aber kein blue bird taxi, weil och diese nicht gefunden habe.

Ich würde wieder hier meinen Urlaub starten :)
title: Preis/ Leistung Top!

text:
Hotel situé à proximité de l'aéroport et avec piscine.
Mais chiens présents à l'hotel donc aboiements fréquents, petit déjeuner léger.
Nous avons pris un "bungalow", qui s'est retrouvé être en fait une suite, un peu grande pour 2 personnes.
title: Convient pour une nuit

text:
ツインルームへ1泊しました。部屋は安さ重視でエアコン無しにしましたが、FANだけで問題無しでした。蚊取り線香が大活躍しました。

朝食は3種類から選べて、パンケーキはとても美味しかったし、スタッフの方もとても親切。庭にプールもあります。

欧米の方が多く、長くステイしている感じでした。ビーチへのアクセスも良く、近くにはビーチで食事を楽しめところもあります。

旅慣れた人にオススメします。
title: 旅慣れた人にオススメ

text: la scelta di questo hotel, è stata per la vicinanza all'aeroporto di Bali.Bella la struttura con giardino e piscina ma il tutto datato, e lasciato andare,meriterebbe una ristrutturazione. A 200 m. dalla spiaggia di Jimbaram e dai numerosi warung che si affacciamo sul mare. Noi avevamo,non una camera ma un appartamento,con un bagno grandissimo anche se esterno,con vasca e doccia.Le pulizie ci hanno lasciato desiderare,lenzuola con grandi macchie,e le stanze con odore di muffa,comunque siamo rimasti una notte.La colazione semplice su ordinazione,per avere un altro caffè,thè ecc era a pagamento. La connessione wifi era disponibile solo nella hall. Personale gentile
title: A quindici minuti dall'aeroporto

text: Nous sommes arrivé dans cet hôtel à 22h en provenance de l'aéroport. bien car proche de l'aéroport (15 mins  en taxi). nous avions réservé via agoda une chambre pour 250 000 idr. Hôtel un peu vétuste  et vieillot mais bon pour le prix c'est quand même pas mal. Les bbq  de poisson sur la plage sont à 200 mètres de l'hôtel. Petit déjeuner correct (prendre les pancakes ils sont délicieux).
title: Bien pour première nuit mais pas plus.

text: Если вы захотите остановиться именно в Джимбаране, покушать морепродуктов, здесь можно остановиться на пару дней. Расположение хорошее, недалекто от пляжа и рыбного ночного маркета. Номера чистые, уборка каждый день. Вай-фай только в холле. Бассейн староват, но плавать можно. Завтраки скудные. Но в целом, на пару дней - неплохо.
title: Неплохой отель на пару дней

text: После этого отеля решила больше никогда не останавливаться в 2-хзвездочных гостиницах! Можно доплатить совсем немного и устроиться с гораздо большим комфортом. Нас поселили в номере, окно которого выходило на высокую стену и в номере было темно и где-то сверху виднелась полоска неба. Кондиционер работал с большим шумом, ванна ооочень старая, обшарпанная и слегка вонючая, полотенца старые и протертые, воду нужно покупать, тогда как в других гостиницах каждый день по две бутылки воды приносят. Бассейн маленький и грязный, какие-то масляные разводы на воде, не рискнула купаться в нем с ребенком, да и не видела ни разу, чтобы кто-то из постояльцев там плавал. Но вместе с тем, в номере чисто, ежедневная уборка и смена полотенец. Завтраки без какого-либо разнообразия - только два варианта - 2 тоста или большой толстый блин, сок и фрукты (как правило, маленькая тарелочка порезанного арбуза). Рядом никаких магазинов. До моря совсем близко, это единственное, что радовало. Вай-фай только возле ресепшена. Кушать ходили в соседнюю гостиницу в кафе. Ужинать на пляже Джимбарана в рыбных ресторанах очень дорого, да и не очень вкусно. Рекомендовала бы все же выбирать отель три звезды - доплатить совсем немного, но удобства больше.
title: Терпимо, но лучше выбрать другой отель

photos.caption: Стена за окном и тонкая полоска неба

text:
Гостиница находится в очень удобном месторасположении, несколько шагов до пляжа Джимбаран, а также в нескольких минутах езды в аэропорт. Поэтому я остановилась в ней в завершении путешествия по Бали, о чем не пожалела. Когда выбирала жилье, villa puri royan была с самыми низкими ценами в этом районе, поэтому высоких требований не ставила. Меня устроило, что в гостинице есть горячая вода, завтраки, приятно удивило наличие гигиенических принадлежностей ( гель для луга, шампунь, зубная щётка и паста ), ежедневная уборка номера. Действительно номеру требуется ремонт ( есть подтеки на стенах и потолке, кое-где ошарпалась краска) и пастельное белье изрядно выстиралось и потемнело. Понравился бассейн и приятная озелененная тенистая зона возле него, спасалась там в особенно жаркие часы, когда на пляже невозможно находиться. В этом районе узенькие улицы с домами, где живут местные, днем исходит не очень приятный запах рыбы и мусора, но вечером приятный морской бриз и красивые закаты, с пляжа можно понаблюдать за взлетающими и садящимися самолетами. Ночью, вернее рано утром, в часов 5 рядышком работает рынок.
При выезде персонал отеля вызвал такси, которое обошлось всего 50 000 до аэропорта. Вообще, персонал отличается дружелюбием и отзывчивостью. Вай-фаем не пользовалась, поэтому сказать ничего по этому поводу не могу. Если буду проездом, то еще раз остановлюсь в этом месте, на весь отпуск или на продолжительное время бы не стала.
title: Идеальный эконом вариант для временного пребывания

text:
vicinissimo alla spiaggia e ai warung della parte centrale della spiaggia! Inoltre al suo interno c'è una piscina immersa in un contesto di pace e!...le camere sono comode e semplici!
Per colazione da provare i loro pancake! Buonissimi!
title: Ottima posizione E pancake deliziosi!

text:
Het hotel ligt in een rustig zijstraatje van de boulevard. De kamers zijn ruim en schoon. Het personeel is vriendelijk en behulpzaam.
Als je hier langer dan 3 dagen blijft wordt het ontbijt, dat inclusief is, eentonig.
title: Dichtbij de visrestaurantjes.

text:
Этот семейный отель находится в районе Джимбаран,в 15 минутах езды от аэропорта и 3 минутах ходьбы от пляжа.До рыбного рынка пешком 5-10 минут.
 Пляж Джимбаран на Бали самый лучший.
 Есть несколько типов номеров. Самый лучший - бангало.
 Спальная и гостинная комнаты,здоровенная ванная комната с полноценной ванной и душем.
 Гостиная оснащена кухонной мебелью и оборудованием с холодильником.Можно готовить самому.
 Посреди небольшой,уютной и очень зеленой территории находится бассейн.
 На ресепшн можно заказать такси и экскурсии по острову.
 Приветливый персонал,ежедневная уборка номеров. Очень тихо и уютно.
 В стоимость включены завтраки.
 Рекомендую непритязательным путешественникам.
title: Уютно и недорого

text:
Avevamo il volo il mattino successivo,  abbiamo scleto jimbaran per essere vicini all'areoporto e lontani dal caos di Kuta per una sola notte .Abbiamo trovato per caso questo posto devo dire, vicinissimo alla spiaggia ,arredato molto bene, pulito grande bagno anche se la vasca non era nuova,  camere molto ampie,la nostra aveva sia il terrazzino interno, sia il tavolo con le sedie che davano sull'atrio interno, con sotto la grande piscina per gli ospiti.Buona anche la colazione inclusa,solo che c'era una sola persona a preparla un pochino lenta,..quindi armatevi di pazienza,wi fi disponibile solo nella hall.In alta stagione abbiamo speso 250000rupie.
Noi siamo stati bene il titolare è stato anche carino.
title: buona qualita' prezzo

text:
Idéal pour une première nuit à Bali car proche de l'aéroport.
Chambre très correcte, petite rue à 150m de la plage, repas sur le sable au couché de soleil.
Personnel accueillant, propres chauffeurs pour excursions ou transfert vers autre destination.
Typique marché au poisson le matin à 10min à pied, hors des chemins touristiques, immersion dans la vie locale.
title: 1ère nuit à Bali - Proche aéroport - Bon rapport qualité prix

text:
Comme évoqué dans pas mal de commentaires très bien situé, proche plage et restaurants de poisson
C'est un hotel qui date un peu mais est globalement agréable, propre, un personnel très accueillant
Les chambres sont grande la literie est bonne, le petit déjeuner inclus correct !
Que demander de plus pour un court séjour
Wifi uniquement a la réception (très bon signal)
title: bon rapport qualité/service/prix

text: Отдыхали семьей , вспоминаем отель с теплотой до сих пор.  Отель маленький уютный, тихий. Номер у нас был на первом этаже , 2 комнаты ( гостевая и спальня), есть кухонный уголок и столовая зона.  Отлично за небольшие деньги. Море рядом, бассейн чистый.  Рекомендую.
title: Хороший отель за небольшие деньги

text:
L'emplacement à 1 minute de la plage, les tarifs, la gentillesse du personnel et la piscine font oublier les quelques soucis d'humidité de la salle de bain..
Le service de restauration sur place est bon marché et délicieux! Testez le Nasi Goreng!!
title: Très bon rapport qualité/emplacement/prix

text: Wir verbrachten hier unsere erste Nacht auf bali und hätten es nicht besser treffen können. Diese Unterkunft hat eine super Location in der Nähe des Flughafens und in der Nähe des Strandes. Wir kamen spät abends an und Würdenträger rotzigem mit offen Armen und einem großen lächeln willkommen gehiessen. Neben dem Pool, dem sauberen und großen Räumen und dem leckeren frühstück hat das Hotel auch noch einen super Roller verleih. Es ist sehr einfach die Südhalbinsel Balis zu erkunden. Neben dem Scooterverleih, organisiert Hans, eine der Angestellten des Hotels, Tours und Transport Möglichkeiten. Dank ihr haben wir nur halb so viel wie nötig für den Weg nach gili trawangan bezahlt. Alles in allem ein super Start!
title: Tolle Unterkunft

text: На самом деле отдыхала я на Бали в 2009 году. Было это очень давно, но я до сих пор вспоминаю проживание в этом замечательном отеле в Джимбаране. Прекрасные вкусные завтраки, тихий уютный номер, отель находится в двух шагах от моря, бассейн! Чего только еще можно пожелать! Жили мы с мамой в этом отеле 2 месяца и всего за 15$ в сутки. Мне кажется, что лучшего места за такие деньги просто не найти. И надеюсь, что я когда-нибудь обязательно вернусь в этот замечательный отель!
title: Самый лучший отель в мире!

text:
Pour info nous avons choisi la chambre avec clim.

Points Positifs :
-Localisation à 2 minutes à pieds de la plage
-Pas très loin de l'aéroport (10 minutes)
-Joli Cadre (piscine sympathique)
-Accueil et disponibilité des hôtes

Points négatifs :
-Chambre vétuste voire très vétuste pour la salle de bain
-Petit déjeuner moyen excepté les pancakes
title: Bien pour une première nuit...

text: 总体性价比还不错的酒店，价格便宜，位置也蛮好的，出门走一分钟就到金巴兰海滩，酒店客房面积也还可以，就是设施比较陈旧了一些，卫生还可以吧，酒店中央有个小泳池，餐厅的菜不错，价格也便宜。
title: 还可以，性价比不错

text: Жила 5 дней сначала в Villa Puri Royan, затем переехала в Puri Bambu Hotel (Т.к. в нем не было свободных номеров на все нужные мне  даты). Находятся они друг от друга в 15 -20 мин ходьбы.Villa Puri Royan небольшой уютный дешевый отельчик, с бассейном, кстати чистым, с большими номерами. У меня был 3-й этаж с балконом, тихий просторный номер. Поскольку днем или на пляже или на экскурсиях, то простецкая обстановка номера не напрягает. Персонал очень приветливый - я заказывала у них трансфер в аэропорту (написала непосредственно в отель) и затем с этим же водителем Руди, все экскурсии.Очень понравилось, он мне везде помогал, даже по магазинам просто так возил.Завтраки в отеле однообразные, но по цене, как говорится и сервис.
